::Zardus::

Zardus nods, acknowledging Tal-X. Predacon technology had obviously 
advanced some since the Iron Fist.

"Of course. Whatever information I have in the Alliance data tracks 
is available. Follow me, I'll show you to a research station."

He turns around, beginning to walk off but pausing for Mortem to 
follow.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., JP3884@a... wrote:
>        Mortem was pleased with what she saw. Not only was Zardus a 
rather 
> intelligent leader, he had the look down too. His sheer size showed 
off his 
> mightiness.
>        "Hello Commander. I am Mortem and this is Tal-X." She made 
reference 
> to the large clunky robot next to her with the digital screen that 
held a 
> blue electric face.
>        Tal made a welcoming gesture, "I am a Predacon Artificial 
Intelligence 
> unit. State of the art. I live to serve." His personality 
programming was 
> basic, but satisfactory.
>        The Ambassador then got down to business. "Alright. I came 
here to 
> track down some bots that are wanted back in Transformer space. 
And, I also 
> came to get all the information possible on this war. Do you think 
you might 
> help me with these things?"
> 
>        Hell Beast sent his troops back to quarters after they had 
unloaded 
> all the materials requested by Unicron. Now, he made his way to the 
bridge to 
> report.
>        Entering, he found the layout the same. Nothing new. That 
was good, in 
> a way. He went to a nearby computer display and plugged in his data 
of all 
> the materials collected.
>        "Sir, here is our find. I hope it was what you were 
expecting." He 
> said, as the list scrolled up over the numerous systems, tools, 
equitment, 
> and parts.
